sql-case.value: SELECT order_id, (SELECT 1) AS num FROM t_order
SELECT t.* FROM (SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id IN (?, ?)) t
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM t_order_item WHERE id = 10)
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM t_order_item WHERE id IN (10, 11))
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE user_id BETWEEN (SELECT user_id FROM t_order_item WHERE order_id = 10) AND ?
SELECT t_order_federate.order_id, t_order_federate.user_id, u.user_id FROM t_order_federate, (SELECT * FROM t_user_info) as u WHERE t_order_federate.user_id = u.user_id
SELECT t_order_federate.order_id, t_order_federate.user_id, (SELECT COUNT(user_id) FROM t_user_info) FROM t_order_federate
SELECT t_order_federate.order_id, t_order_federate.user_id, (SELECT CONCAT(order_id, user_id) FROM t_user_info) FROM t_order_federate
SELECT t_order_federate.order_id, t_order_federate.user_id FROM t_order_federate WHERE user_id IN (SELECT * FROM t_user_info)

SELECT t_order_federate.order_id, t_order_federate.user_id FROM t_order_federate WHERE user_id BETWEEN (SELECT user_id FROM t_user_info WHERE information = 'before') AND (SELECT user_id FROM t_user_info WHERE information = 'after')
SELECT t_order_federate.order_id, t_order_federate.user_id FROM t_order_federate WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM t_user_info WHERE t_order_federate.user_id = t_user_info.user_id)
SELECT t_order_federate.order_id, t_order_federate.user_id FROM t_order_federate WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM t_user_info WHERE t_order_federate.user_id = t_user_info.user_id)
